title.en: A Prayer to Jamyang Khyentse Wangpo

text.en: Single embodiment of the wisdom, love and spiritual power
text.en-trans: jampéyangsok sé ché gyal kün gyi

text.en: Of all the victorious ones and their heirs, Mañjughoṣa and the rest,
text.en-trans: khyentsénü sum chik tu düpé ngö

text.en: Glorious guru, lord among learned and accomplished masters —
To you I pray: look on me with eyes of compassion!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so tukjé chen gyi zik

text.en: Pacify the sufferings of this life, the next and the bardo state.
text.en-trans: di chi bardö dukngal zhiwa dang

text.en: Increase longevity, merit, prosperity, favourable circumstances and everything positive.
text.en-trans: tsé sö paljor tünkyen lektsok gyé

text.en: Inspire all beings with whom I am connected with your blessings
text.en-trans: dreltsé dro kün dechen zhingkham su

text.en: So that they may attain ultimate enlightenment in Sukhāvatī.
